title: IBM Posts Revenue That Tops Estimates on Software Gains
description: International Business Machines Corp. reported quarterly sales that topped analysts’ estimates on strong growth for its closely watched software unit.
content: International Business Machines Corp. reported quarterly sales that topped analysts’ estimates on strong growth for its closely watched software unit.
